description: Primes p such that 2^p + 3 is prime.
comments: The next term p is greater than 100000, corresponding to a prime 2^p + 3 with more than 30000 digits. - _Ryan Propper_, Aug 24 2005
references: J.-M. De Koninck, Ces nombres qui nous fascinent, Entry 67, p. 24, Ellipses, Paris 2008.
author: _G. L. Honaker, Jr._, Oct 29 2000
